page.title: 13A Day in my Life(2) - Darwen
page.content: { Thursday.}I got up to go{running.}Ran to Sett End;took 30 minutes.Had {breakfast,dressed}and{washed.}Set off for{bus}to{school}8.30am;arrived 8.50. { Register}at 9.10;Mrs.Williamson absent so taken by Year Mistress. Period 1,{European Studies}followed by break.Played football in yard.Periods 2 & 3,{Metalwork;}making a keyring. Home for{dinner}and had{fish and {chips}from chipshop.Returned to{school 1.10pm. Period 4,{Science,}last period {English.}Caught bus{home}for 11p. Had bag of{chips}and a drink of{pop then did my{homework.}When my Mum arrived home she made{tea - fish and {chips. After tea,went to{Scouts.}I cooked {sausages}on a fire. Then went home to {bed. by Jason Hollings, aged 13.
